description:
Most of the students have returned from the alternate universe only to find that a few of their friends were left behind.  Full of guilt, Judai concocts a dangerous plan to get them back.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ace Card Dai Shuugou!! Ake, Jigen no Tobira!
Grand gathering of ace cards!! Open door of different dimension
エースカード大集合!! 開け, 次元の扉!
